availability.p: For internal use by the Faclair na Gàidhlig/DASG projects

msContents.summary: The Dialogue of St Anselm and the Virgin Mary is an account of the Passion, delivered by the Virgin Mary in response to questions from St Anselm. Liber Scintillarum is a thematically grouped collection of extracts from the Bible and the Church Fathers, translated into Early Modern Gaelic, and occasionally accompanied by commentary.

msItem.title: Note from the Highland Pedigrees
msItem.incipit: ag eoin a hile condregaid clann domnaill ...
msItem.explicit: ... nir fagaib clann mac ag bat a shil

msItem.title: The Royal Instruction of King Solomon
msItem.incipit: Bai righ amhra aireadha for macaib Israel ...
msItem.explicit: ... isna dalibh deghenecha. FINIT AMEN finit

msItem.title: The Passion of Philip
msItem.incipit: Bai Pilip apstal frith re .xx. bliadan ar cesad Crist ...
msItem.explicit: ... at iat sin credidh righe in tathair agus in mac agus in spirut naem. Finit.

msItem.title: Dialogue of St Anselm and the Virgin Mary
msItem.incipit: Do bi Ansalmus naemh aimser imchian maille re deraib ...
msItem.explicit: ... Annaladh an tigerna annso .i. mile bl iadain 7 cetra .c. 7 secht bliadna 7 tri .xx. F[init]

titleStmt.title: Dialogue of St Anselm and the Virgin Mary

msItem.title: Extracts from Liber Scintillarum
msItem.explicit: ... do lucht an -gap- peann{ud} -gap-

filiation.p: The present text is a translation, and occasionally an expansion, of selected extracts from the much longer Latin original. No other Gaelic text related to this translation is currently known.

msItem.title: Prayer
msItem.explicit: ... mar sin an guidhe et reliqua

msItem.title: Confession
msItem.explicit: ... agus slaneochaid sib et reliqua

msItem.title: Humility
msItem.explicit: ... {{istigh} na righthedh } et reliqua

msItem.title: Forgiveness
msItem.explicit: ... na moran maille { egoin }

msItem.title: Renuncíation of the World
msItem.explicit: ... is neamhcara do dhia he et reliqua

msItem.title: Remorse
msItem.explicit: ... is fearr beth subhach {na} dubach

msItem.title: Fear
msItem.explicit: ... { acht naigheann se aeni }

msItem.title: Chastity
msItem.explicit: ... a cuing phosda

msItem.title: Confession (cont.)
msItem.explicit: ... ni fettur a leiges

msItem.title: Penitence
msItem.explicit: ... do lucht an -gap- peann{ud} -gap-

msItem.title: Passion of John the Baptist
msItem.incipit: Bai righ amra etrocaireach isin doman toir feacht naill .i. Iruath mac Ainntepater ...
msItem.explicit: ... 7 do moladh uile an coimdhe leo otchunnchadar na mírbuile dognithi gach laei tre ceann .B.i. nahoighe 7 an mairt

msItem.title: Apsalon, baile in righ
msItem.explicit: ... fan cenn toir a napsalon

msItem.title: The Seven Gifts of the Holy Spirit
msItem.explicit: ... tri .l. salm molta do dhia et reliqua

titleStmt.title: The Seven Gifts of the Holy Spirit

msItem.title: On adulterous priests and deacons
msItem.incipit: In capitulo si qui sunt prespiteri ...
msItem.explicit: ... amen dico boibis secla seclorum

msItem.title: Why there are no snakes in Ireland
msItem.incipit: In tan tancadar mic Israel tar Muir Ruaidh ...
msItem.explicit: ... agus cobi ancur rehædeaduib et reliqua

titleStmt.title: Why there are no snakes in Ireland

msItem.title: On the devotion of Baithín
msItem.incipit: Ni bith Baithin dano ingach aimsir ...
msItem.explicit: ... ni cuiredh Baithin cuil no corrmil de

msItem.title: On the physical appearance of Christ and the apostles
msItem.incipit: degusg crist et na apstalaib annso...
msItem.explicit: ... an tirhuaith sin ler dicheannadh e finid amen

titleStmt.title: On the physical appearance of Christ and the apostles

msItem.title: On Anna and her descendants
msItem.explicit: ... robo mor in fuath dar marbad Eoin la Irhuath

msItem.title: On Christ’s apostles, disciples, deacons and womenfolk
msItem.explicit: ... robadar cena tri ingena tonib in faistip

titleStmt.title: On Christ’s apostles, disciples, deacons and womenfolk

msItem.title: On the Agnus Dei
msItem.explicit: ... tu fa deoigh et reliqua

msItem.title: On Virginity
msItem.incipit: An fius na neun re ader Annsirnus ...
msItem.explicit: ... do maithes fein

msItem.title: On St Paphnutius
msItem.incipit: Bui trath aroile comtinol manach craitfech ...
msItem.explicit: ... arsin bamar co tert namharach gan labairt etir
